name: Floki Santa
description: On Dec. 25, 2021, Elon Musk posted a photo of his dog in a Santa costume with the caption “Floki Santa” in Twitter. Though Musk only seems to be referring to the fact that his dog is in a costume, Dog-themed cryptocurrency surges 3500% after this tweet. In 2022, our team expects Musk will tweet about “Floki Santa” again, creating another crypto Christmas miracle.
